name: Food Fight (itch) (DankNStein)
description:
You are a baby.

Evil vegetables are going to eat you.

Fight for survival using toys for weapons.

This game is VERY hard. 

Food Fight is a pixel-art-wave-survival-twin-stick-shooter-type-thing. The game was made during the month of October 2022 for the #devtober game jam. It is my first ever game development project. All programming, art, sound and game design by me.

Big shout out to Heart Beast on YouTube who's tutorials helped me get started with game development. This game would not have been possible without these videos to jump start my progress.

DankNStein Games #001

Check out my post mortem here:

https://www.youtube.com/post/Ugkx5RMMaN7u2t50YMEiFozJUreCZA99yq5J
